*div1 type="summary"* *p*Dr. John Sibley to Austin, September 15, 1826. General news of the United States and Europe.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-15-1826">Sept 15th 182*/date_mentioned**/p*6 *p*Sir*/p*
*p*I Accidentally met a *person_mentioned*Man */person_mentioned*who says he lives in your *location_mentioned*Neighbourhood*/location_mentioned* who will bring you a few papers such as in a hurry I can Scramble together. I have been confined by Sickness some Months during which I have had no opportunity of writing or knowing of any conveyance to you—I understand some arrangements are taking place for an exchange of Mails between *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*and the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned*— Since the rising of Congress the *location_mentioned*public papers*/location_mentioned* are less interesting, they are all filled with the *date_mentioned n="07-04-1826">4th of July*/date_mentioned* Proceedings and on the subject of the Remarkable Coincident in the almost simultaneous death of the *person_mentioned*ex President Adams*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Jefferson */person_mentioned*on that day.—Our *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*from Sabine to St. Croix*/location_mentioned* seem engaged in devising and executing Internal improvements The *location_mentioned*canal cross the Base of Cape Florida */location_mentioned*will be important; Indeed all of them the *location_mentioned*ohio canal*/location_mentioned*, with *location_mentioned*one End near the City of Cincinati*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*the other Cleveland on Lake Eri*/location_mentioned*, the *location_mentioned*Chesepeak and Deleware Canal*/location_mentioned*, the *location_mentioned*Cape Cod Canal*/location_mentioned*, one *location_mentioned*from Michigan to Islenois*/location_mentioned*, and an hundred others; going on and talked about as well as the great *location_mentioned*Panama Canal*/location_mentioned*, a Number of Bailed way *location_mentioned*Roads */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Turn Pikes*/location_mentioned* are going on; the great *location_mentioned*Road from Washington to New Orleans*/location_mentioned* will soon commence. Our *person_mentioned*Manufactures */person_mentioned*seem to keep pace with other improvements. A Steam Boat Navigation will Certainly be extended up *location_mentioned*Red River*/location_mentioned* (perhaps) to *location_mentioned*New Mexico*/location_mentioned*. In Our *location_mentioned*Parish*/location_mentioned* without seeming to be sickly there has been a Number of deaths Those you know are *person_mentioned*Doctor Levis*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Luke S. Hazelton*/person_mentioned*. and *person_mentioned*Sam1 Keiser*/person_mentioned* At *location_mentioned*Alexandria*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*John Carson*/person_mentioned*. *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* by the last accounts is uncommonly healthy. *person_mentioned*Genl Hampton*/person_mentioned* is dead no conspicuous Character in the *location_mentioned*City*/location_mentioned*, the yellow fever rages at *location_mentioned*Mobile*/location_mentioned*. From *location_mentioned*Europe */location_mentioned*the Riots in *location_mentioned*England */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Scotland */location_mentioned*amongst the *person_mentioned*weavers*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*factions */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Spain */location_mentioned*opposed to the *person_mentioned*Kings party*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*France */person_mentioned*quiet and improving in *person_mentioned*Manufactures */person_mentioned*etc. The *person_mentioned*Govt of *location_mentioned*Russia*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* not well settled. *location_mentioned*Turkey */location_mentioned*has been obliged to give up to that Power *location_mentioned*Walatia */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Maldavia*/location_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*(Antient Massadonia)*/location_mentioned*—The *person_mentioned*Greeks */person_mentioned*have suffered, but are not giving up the ship. Private Opinion in all the countries of *location_mentioned*Europe */location_mentioned*is warm towards them. *location_mentioned*Turkey */location_mentioned*is crippled by the War and never can conquer them. Our *person_mentioned*Gov*/person_mentioned*. is placing above us *location_mentioned*On the Waters of Red River and Arkansa*/location_mentioned* more than fifty thousand *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*of different and discordant *person_mentioned*Tribes */person_mentioned*I do not like the Policy, not for the reason only, that it will hasten their extinction. The *person_mentioned*Caddos */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Quapas*/person_mentioned*, are going to settle above you On the same *location_mentioned*River*/location_mentioned*.—They will be peacable, but unprofitable *person_mentioned*Neighbours*/person_mentioned*.-—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Judge Johnston*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*live at *location_mentioned*Washington*/location_mentioned*, they were in *location_mentioned*New York*/location_mentioned* a *date_mentioned n="08-xx1826">Month */date_mentioned*ago. Our*person_mentioned* Members of Congress*/person_mentioned* are all Reelected from this *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Please to Present my compliments to your *person_mentioned*brother */person_mentioned*to *person_mentioned*Capt. Clark*/person_mentioned* and any Other friend or acquantance.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Sibley*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hon. Judge Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
